meta-review.comment: Another Code Recollection is a delightful mystery adventure that will have you hooked from the get-go. With intuitive puzzles and a captivating storyline, this game is a must-play for fans of the genre. The gameplay is smooth and engaging, with just the right amount of challenge to keep you on your toes. The beautiful visuals and atmospheric soundtrack add to the immersive experience. Get ready to lose yourself in the world of Another Code Recollection!
